document.full_text: united airlines temporarily revived the flight numbers of two hijacked planes used in the september 11 attacks but said on wednesday the move was inadvertent and they would not be used.
document.title: united inadvertently revives 9/11 flight numbers
lines_and_colors: united airlines temporarily revived the flight numbers of two hijacked planes used in the september 11 attacks but said on wednesday the move was inadvertent and they would not be used.
